item.title: Germany quits nuclear power
item.description: Germany recently shut down its last three nuclear power plants as part of a long-planned transition toward renewable energy.
item.keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, Germany, nuclear power, nuclear power plants, renewable energy
item.media:title: Germany quits nuclear power
item.media:keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content,Germany, nuclear power, nuclear power plants, renewable energy

item.title: Flee or stay put? Ukrainian civilians weigh up the risks
item.description: Every day in the front-line cities of eastern Ukraine is a gamble. A decision to leave your shelter to get food could be your last. Yet there are people who are staying, and their reasons are complex, though some in this report have since been brought to safety by the "White Angels" police team
item.keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, Ukraine war, evacuation, civilians, Avdiivka, Chasiv Yar, front line
item.media:title: Flee or stay put? Ukrainian civilians weigh up the risks
item.media:keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content,Ukraine war, evacuation, civilians, Avdiivka, Chasiv Yar, front line

item.title: Does Angela Merkel deserve this award?
item.description: Former Chancellor Angela Merkel received Germany's highest Order of Merit today. But not everyone thinks she should have gotten it.
item.keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, Angela Merkel, Germany, Order of Merit, former chancellor
item.media:title: Does Angela Merkel deserve this award?
item.media:keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content,Angela Merkel, Germany, Order of Merit, former chancellor

item.title: Ukraine: Teenage soldier adjusts to life after losing a leg on the frontline
item.description: Ruslana Danilkina was only 18 when she volunteered for the Ukrainian army. She was wounded on the battlefield and lost her leg. She tells us she had to learn to accept her new self.
item.keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content, Ukraine, Russia, war, female soldier, girl, 18 years old, amputated leg
item.media:title: Ukraine: Teenage soldier adjusts to life after losing a leg on the frontline
item.media:keywords: DWVC, vertical content, mobile content,Ukraine, Russia, war, female soldier, girl, 18 years old, amputated leg
